author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-5673: MMapDirectory: Work around a "bug" in the JDK that throws a confusing OutOfMemoryError wrapped inside IOException if the FileChannel  mapping failed because of lack of virtual address space. The IOException is rethrown with more useful information about the problem, omitting the incorrect OutOfMemoryError

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3161 - SlingIDE Import Content wizard should respect .vltignore
Take into account .vltignore files which are present under the content
sync root but not under the import root.

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3161 - SlingIDE Import Content wizard should respect .vltignore
Respect found .vltignore files found when importing.

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3161 - SlingIDE Import Content wizard should respect .vltignore
Add an IgnoredResources abstraction in the api project.
